sen.j: 九条通（くじょうどおり）は京都市の主要な東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: The Kujo-dori Street is one of the major east-west running streets in Kyoto.
Kujo-dori Street is one of the major east-west streets in Kyoto.
Kujo-dori Street is one of the major east-west streets in Kyoto City.

sen.j: 平安京の南端の九条大路にあたる。
sen.e: It corresponds to the Kujo-oji Street of Heiankyo.
It corresponds to the Kujo-oji Street of Heiankyo.
It corresponds to the Kujo-oji Street south of Heian-kyo.

sen.j: 東は鴨川 (淀川水系)の東山橋東詰で東大路通につながり、西は葛野大路通に突き当たる。
sen.e: It is connected to the Higashioji-dori Street at Higashiyama-bashi-higashizume in the east and meets the Kadonoji-dori Street in the west.
It is connected to Higashioji-dori Street at Higashiyama-bashi-higashizume in the east and meets Kadonoji-dori Street in the west.
It is connected to Higashioji-dori Street at Higashiyama-bashi-higashizume of the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa River system) in the east, and it meets Kadonooji-dori Street in the west.
sen.cmt: 鴨川の 追加 Kadonoojiに修正

sen.j: 千本通から西でやや南へ、西大路通からはさらに大きく南に振れていて、平安時代のものとは大きくずれている。
sen.e: Its course greatly differs from that in the Heian era because the street now turns moderately southward from the west side of the Senbon-dori Street and further goes south from the Nishioji-dori Street.
Its course greatly differs from that in the Heian era because the street now turns moderately southward from the west side of the Senbon-dori Street and further goes south from Nishioji-dori Street.

Its course greatly differs from that in the Heian period because the street now turns moderately southward from the west side of the Senbon-dori Street and also extends south from Nishioji-dori Street.

sen.j: 現在の千本通との交差点あたりに羅城門があった。
sen.e: There was Rajomon Gate around the crossing with the present Senbaon-dori Street.
There was Rajomon Gate around the crossing with the present Senbaon-dori Street.
There was Rajomon Gate around the crossing with the present Senbaon-dori Street.

sen.j: その羅城門は980年（天元 (日本)3）に暴風雨で倒壊した後には再建されず、現在は碑が立っているのみとなっている。
sen.e: The Rajomon Gate was not repaired after being ruined by a destructive storm in 980 with only a monument being left behind.
The Rajomon Gate was not repaired after being ruined by a destructive storm in 980 with only a monument being left behind.
The Rajomon Gate was not repaired after being ruined by a destructive storm in 980, so today only a monument is left in its place.

sen.j: 昭和初年に道路拡幅された。
sen.e: The street was widened in the first year of Showa.
The street was widened in the first year of Showa.
The street was widened in the first year of Showa.

sen.j: 1939年（昭和14）京都市電が東大路から西大路まで全通するが、1978年（昭和53）に廃止となった。
sen.e: Kyoto City trams, which opened in 1939 between the Higashioj-dori Street and the Nishioji-dori Street, was abolished in 1978.
Kyoto City trams, which opened in 1939 between the Higashioj-dori Street and the Nishioji-dori Street, was abolished in 1978.
Kyoto City Trams, which opened in 1939 between Higashioji-dori Street and Nishioji-dori Street, was abolished in 1978.

sen.j: 油小路通から壬生川通（京阪国道口）までは国道1号、壬生川通から葛野大路通にかけては国道171号となっている。
sen.e: The section between the Abura-no-koji dori Street and the Mibugawa-dori Street (Keihan-kokudo guchi) belongs to National Highway Route No. 1, and the section between the Mibugawa-dori Street and the Kadonoji-dori Street belongs to National Highway Route No. 171.

The section between Abura-no-koji dori Street and the Mibugawa-dori Street (Keihan-kokudo guchi) belongs to National Highway Route No. 1, and the section between Mibugawa-dori Street and Kadonoji-dori Street belongs to National Highway Route No. 171.

The section between Abura-no-koji dori Street and Mibugawa-dori Street (Keihan-kokudo guchi) belongs to National Route 1, and the section between Mibugawa-dori Street and Kadonooji-dori Street belongs to National Route 171.

sen.j: 交差する道路の特記がないものは市町村道。
sen.e: Roads unless specified are operated by local municipalities.
Roads are operated by local municipalities unless otherwise specified.
Roads are operated by local municipalities unless otherwise specified.
